Looking Ahead
2023 will be a dynamic year. Whatever it brings, it is exciting and 
rewarding to work for a company that believes taking care of our people is our business, and that a commitment to doing the right things, not always the popular things, is what makes a company resilient and profitable. We’re proud of the work we’ve accomplished at Akamai in the past year and look forward to the challenges and opportunities the next year will bring.
